job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: pstrongAt MRP we know its crucial that our people reflect the diversity of our customers from around the world And we know that having people from all walks of life makes us a more creative and innovative company That variety of experience culture and background allows our teams to truly drive innovation and create a great experience for both our people and our customers MRP is a place where we value Diversity amp Inclusion and we work really hard to be a great place to work for everyonestrongppbrppstrongCompany OverviewnbspstrongppFounded as a company focused on providing net new sales opportunities for marketing and sales teams MRP has evolved into a leading global predictive intelligence organization providing fully integrated end to end accountbased marketing services For over 16 years clients have relied on MRP to help them achieve their revenue goals by combining cuttingedge predictive analytics with a full suite of accountbased marketing services to acquire new customersppbrppMRP is a leading provider of predictive analytics software and accountbased marketing services Positioned for yet another year of growth we are looking for a Machine Learning Engineer to join our development teamppbrppThe candidate will be working on the team responsible for MRP Prelytix an enterprise class predictive ABM platform that drives higher response rates pipeline conversion and pipeline value by enhancing sales and marketing execution with predictive analytics and intelligenceppnbspppThe role will be joining other machine learning engineers reporting to our Chief Data Scientist and working closely with our software engineers and data scientists in Montreal Philadelphia and IrelandppnbspppstrongResponsibilities includestrongppnbsppulliUsing various datasets around the topics of customer engagement and marketing performance you will be creating robust predictive models to generate insights prescribe actions and attribute resultsliliYou will be extracting and selecting features from large structured unstructured and semistructured datasetsliliYou will be analyzing result sets to identify anomalies and historical norms and order to continuously improve the quality of the models output and their usefulness in solving real life business problemsliliCollaborating with engineers designers and product managers to provide product impact and deliver value to our customersliulpnbspppstrongThe ideal candidate will possessstrongppnbsppulliAn excellent academic record in computer science mathematics or a similarly quantitative disciplinelili3 years of experience with the development deployment and monitoring of machine learning models in a production environmentlili3 years of handson experience with python or R within a modern machine learning framework such as PyTorch or TensorflowliliStrong communication skills with an ability to explain the result of their experiments to nontechnical peopleliliKnowledge of statistics and linear algebraliliProven ability to write maintainable clear codeliliAn understanding of the role of the Cloud in the development cycleliliFamiliarity with SQL or similar query languageliliExperience working with Linux AWS Sagemaker Databricks Azure ML Studio or similar data science workflow toolsliulpp
